reviewText: One of several attempts at illustrating the history of the 1918 flu, and a very good one.  Very up-to-date, that is, about 3 years behind the time now in 2016, but still valuable.  The DNA has been isolated.  Now there are re-creations of the deadly virus.  Let's hope it does not escape the lab.

This film is very interesting and based on facts.......that's what makes it so dang scary. Thankfully, hopefully the majority of us are aware enough to help prevent modern day doomsday flu scenerios. At least that's what we want to believe! This is definitively one to add to every prepper video library.
